snippet: Reader responses to our last Complaint Box, about mail addressed to the dead.
abstract: Reader responses to our last Complaint Box, about mail addressed to the dead.
lead_paragraph: Monday's Complaint Box reader submission from Bill Stoller, of Pleasantville, N.Y., touched on the most delicate of subjects - death.

headline.main: Jury Duty for the Dead and More From the Complaint Box Mailbox
